source.name: source
source.description: Pick where your data comes from, Content or Management API
source.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

identifier.name: identifier
identifier.description: The ID or slug of the story to get
identifier.ai_hint: The ID or slug of the story to get

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

space.name: space
space.description: The name of the space. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
space.ai_hint: The name of the space. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: options
language
options.description: Language code to publish the story individually (must be enabled in the space settings)

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF source == 'contentApi' THEN SHOW parameter 'resource'
IF source == 'managementApi' THEN SHOW parameter 'resource'
IF source == 'contentApi' AND resource == 'story' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF source == 'contentApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'identifier'
IF source == 'contentApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF source == 'contentApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF source == 'contentApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'space'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'storyId'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'space'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'storyId'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'space'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'publish' THEN SHOW parameter 'space'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'publish' THEN SHOW parameter 'storyId'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'publish' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'unpublish' THEN SHOW parameter 'space'
IF source == 'managementApi' AND resource == 'story' AND operation == 'unpublish' THEN SHOW parameter 'storyId'
